attr.title: April Dabble Dazzle
attr.desc: The fruit of the Great Tree grows all year long. To claim it, one must follow the Mazana Tribe's ritual.
attr.inst: Download the VM compile from itch.io https://gifteador.itch.io/april-dabble-dazzle and copy all of the files into `ports/aprildabbledazzle/assets/`.
attr.inst_md: Download the VM compile from [itch.io](https://gifteador.itch.io/april-dabble-dazzle) and copy all of the files into `ports/aprildabbledazzle/assets/`.
